pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Extra Care Blonde Anti-Yellow Toning Purple Shampoo 250ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Extra Care Purple Shampoo is formulated with ANTI-YELLOW TECHNOLOGY with intense violet pigments to neutralise yellow & brassy tones. With OMEGAPLEX ANTIBREAKAGE
TECHNOLOGY + BLUEBERRY EXTRACT for hair repair & stronger hair

Your blonde, bleached or highlighted hair can become subject to
unwanted brassy and yellow tones and the hair can feel dry and
damaged. It requires special care to neutralise these unwanted tones
while repairing the hair for a cooler colour result and stronger hair.

EXTRA CARE PURPLE SHAMPOO offers:
+ ANTI-YELLOW TECHNOLOGY FOR NEUTRALISATION OF YELLOW
& BRASSY TONES
+ OMEGAPLEX ANTI-BREAKAGE TECHNOLOGY FOR STRONGER
HAIR
+ VISIBLY IMPROVED HAIR QUALITY WITH INTENSE SHINE

Extra Care Purple Shampoo contains ANTI-YELLOW TECHNOLOGY with
intense violet pigments to revive and brighten gold, blonde and naturally grey
hair for a cooler result.

Made in Australia
100% Recyclable via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for more details

Suitable For: Blonde, Bleached or Highlighted Hair

Size: 250mL

Hair Type: Blonde, Bleached or Highlighted Hair

KEY FEATURES

• Neutralises Yellow & Brassy Tones, with Anti-Breakage Technology
• 100% Recyclable via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for more details
• EXTRA CARE formulas with LIQUID KERATIN, ADVANCED HAIR
TECHNOLOGY & NATURAL ACTIVES help repair existing
damage and provide protection with visibly improved hair
quality.
• Extra Care Purple Shampoo contains ANTI-YELLOW TECHNOLOGY with
intense violet pigments to revive and brighten gold, blonde and naturally grey
hair for a cooler result.

Warnings

Keep out of reach of children. This product is not recommended for highly bleached or very porous hair. Avoid contact with clothing, plastic, porous or absorbent surfaces. If spillage occurs, rinse immediately with cold water.

CAUTION

Keep out of reach of children. This product is not recommended for highly bleached or very porous hair. Avoid contact with clothing, plastic, porous or absorbent surfaces. If spillage occurs, rinse immediately with cold water.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Keep out of reach of children. This product is not recommended for highly bleached or very porous hair. Avoid contact with clothing, plastic, porous or absorbent surfaces. If spillage occurs, rinse immediately with cold water.

FLAMMABLE WARNING

No

Ingredients

Aqua (Water, Eau), Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Cocamide MEA, Parfum (Fragrance), PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Glycol Distearate, Acid Violet 43, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Laureth-4, Panthenol, Glycerin, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Magnesium Chloride, Sodium Hydroxide, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, Steardimonium Hydroxypropyl Hydrolyzed Keratin, Propylene Glycol, Amodimethicone/Morpholinomethyl Silesquioxane Copolymer, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Linalyl Acetate, Limonene, Sodium Sulfate, Trideceth-5, Magnesium Citrate, Benzoic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Sorbic Acid

Directions

Apply a generous amount into wet hair. Leave on for up to 5 minutes depending on the desired result. Rinse thoroughly after application.
Follow with the Extra Care Purple Conditioner We recommend using gloves with this product as staining may occur. Use regularly depending on the desired neutralisation level. Keep out of reach of children.
SAFETY INSTRUCTIONS: This product is not recommended for highly bleached or very porous hair. Avoid contact with clothing, plastic, porous or absorbent surfaces. If spillage occurs, rinse immediately with cold water.

SAFETY DIRECTIONS

Keep out of reach of children. This product is not recommended for highly bleached or very porous hair. Avoid contact with clothing, plastic, porous or absorbent surfaces. If spillage occurs, rinse immediately with cold water.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Tube & Cap are Kerbside Recyclable. Tube & Cap can also be recycled via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for details

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes

Recycling Code: 2 PEHD or HDPE
